offerDetails.name: McAfee Security Premium
offerDetails.description: You're currently on McAfee Security Standard. Change to McAfee Security Premium for an extra $4 per month on your Spark bill.

notifications.text:
Changing to McAfee Security Standard requires you to uninstall McAfee Security from all your devices. Spark will send you a notification to support you with this, and the activation and reinstallation on up to 5 devices. 
We suggest you do this in one go as your devices are unprotected during this change.
